Rinse out any contaminants and recycle.
Rinse out any contaminants and recycle.
Clear any contaminants and recycle.
Is not recyclable in general waste bin. If recycling, please find an appropriate center.
Make sure there is no liquid or contaminant on the box by cutting those parts out.\n\nIf the box has too much contamination, throw it out. Flatten and recycle.
Make sure there is no remaining food on the box. Flatten and recycle.
Make sure there is no liquid or contaminant on the paper by cutting those parts out.\n\nIf the paper has too much contamination, throw it out.
Rinse out any contaminants and recycle.
Rinse out any contaminants. Remove the lid, place it inside the can, and recycle.
Rinse out any contaminants. Remove any tabs and recycle.
Is not recyclable in general waste bin. If recycling, please find an appropriate center.
Is not recyclable in general waste bin. If recycling, please try composting.
